attributes.action: Create more ‘work from home ‘ job opportunities
attributes.additional_details: Because there are so many people out there wanting to work but not being able to for various reasons , also there are to many people handed excuses for not working . More work from home opportunities will be beneficial for the country . During lockdown many people where working from home and still are !  I can hear the kids on the other end of the phone , it doesn’t effect the service given, it’s realistic . Lockdown has shown how many jobs can be done from home and it’s often overlooked
attributes.background: Create more job opportunities for people that can’t work due to having children to young for school , disabilities that make it harder to be in a normal workplace or any other reason that prevents them from being employed .
